projects.title: shotbot africa, mauritius
projects.description: Shopbot Africa is a food and grocery delivery platform operating in Nigeria and Mauritius. Through its mobile app, users can order meals, drinks, and groceries from a variety of restaurants and shops, with deliveries made directly to their doorstep

projects.title: charterhouse-management
projects.description: charterhouse management is an asset management system for all kind of assets with a full crud functionality

projects.title: Advice generator
projects.description: The perfect project if you're learning how to interact with 3rd-party APIs. This challenge uses the Advice Slip API to generate random quotes of advice.

projects.title: Github user search
projects.description: In this project, i used the GitHub users API to pull profile data and display it. It's a great challenge if you're looking to practice working with a 3rd-party API.

projects.title: Getlinked
projects.description: this was hackathon challenge to build the getlinked hr website

projects.title: flyo themed
projects.description: This design has some nice layout challenges in it. A perfect training ground to practice your Flexbox and/or Grid skills.

projects.title: Go to space
projects.description: This project is a fun collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell! If you like, you can follow along and watch Kevin complete the project on Scrimba. Lots to learn!

projects.title: Rest countries Api
projects.description: A project that searchs for any country you want fo find and filters countries according to continent.i Used vue.JS framework to pull data from the REST Countries API.
